853180.name: Just Fishing: Westfall Pack
853180.description:
In "Westfall Pack" you will have access to a new location and a plot-related series of quests.
Here you will meet a new character - the Chef, help him to create a special fish menu. You will receive various valuable awards, including the exclusive and most powerful light reel in their category!
Beautiful locations await you, fish species not previously seen and much more.
- two unique light rods;
- the new exclusive series of lures "Bass Master" *;
- a new baitmix "Bass" *.
Also, when you purchase a DLC, you will receive a set of bait and attractants, a game currency and a bonus to experience.
* new lures and accessories can not be purchased in the game store, but it's also possible to find them in red chests.
853180.supported_languages: 英语, 德语, 俄语
